channel.title: ENA2 - Englanti globaalina kielenä on JPEL - Englannin materiaalia
channel.description: Recent content in ENA2 - Englanti globaalina kielenä on JPEL - Englannin materiaalia

item.title: Conditionals and If-Clauses: Final Test
item.description: function Quiz(questions) { this.score = 0; this.questions = questions; this.questionIndex = 0; } Quiz.prototype.getQuestionIndex = function() { return this.questions[this.questionIndex]; } Quiz.prototype.guess = function(answer) { if (this.getQuestionIndex().isCorrectAnswer(answer)) { this.score++; } else { displayFinalMessage();} this.questionIndex++; } Quiz.prototype.isEnded = function() { return this.questionIndex === this.questions.length; } function startOver() { location.reload(true); } function Question(text, choices, answer) { this.text = text; this.choices = choices; this.answer = answer; } Question.

item.title: Passiivi: Kirjoita 1
item.description: Fill in the blanks with the correct form of the verb in passive voice. The new software    (develop) by a small team of engineers. It    (design) to be user-friendly and efficient. The project    (not expect) to be completed so quickly. After all, it    (consider) a challenging task. - How    (the software, test) before its release? - The software    (test) thoroughly by our quality assurance team.
